name: Dwarven Delver
description:
You're a lone Dwarf trying to dig and go deeper and deeper to find precious gems. Beware of venomous bats and falling rocks!

Use WASD or Arrow Keys to navigate through Dirt and Rock to get deeper into the earth to find precious Gems. With your superior strength, one Pickaxe hit will break a dirt block and 2 hits will break rock. Collect the pickaxes left behind from other miners to improve yours so it takes less Stamina to dig. Feeling a little peckish? Eat a red cave Mushroom to restore your stamina. Make sure you beware of Bats because they will bite if you get too close. There are also cave-ins that happen sometimes so be careful of Falling Rocks.

All assets were created by James Fitzgerald (Cavedens) - Creatorship Games.

Game Created with GMS 1.4.

Artwork Created with Aseprite.

Music Created with BeepBox.co.

SFX Created with SFXR.
